alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Moultrie; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Coles, northern Moultrie, southern Piatt, southwestern Champaign and western Douglas Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 547 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cerro Gordo, or 11 miles southwest of Monticello, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuscola, Arcola, Villa Grove, Arthur, Bement, Cerro Gordo, Atwood, Lovington, Pesotum, Hammond, Cooks Mill, Bourbon, Ivesdale, Garrett, Lake City, Chesterville, Milmine, Cadwell and La Place. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 202 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
